title: Tigress Tamed Book 2: The Iron Fist
description: Amanda Taylor has given up her life as a high flyer and celebrity to become a full time sub. The next step seems the obvious one, to become a ponygirl. However, in the hands of the Power Play people, this is far more than she ever dreams. She is turned into a ponygirl, her vocal cords are paralysed, her life reduced to that of a pony/workhorse and body to be taken at will by all. She finds this to be the perfect life for her and falls willingly into all that is done to her.
author: Derek Traytor
